title: Coronavirus stats from Worldometer · Apify
name: Coronavirus stats from Worldometer
description: Gets the statistics of COVID-19 in the world from https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/.
full_readme:
Coronavirus stats from Worldometers

Actor gets an actual number of infected, deceased and recovered people from https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/.

Latest data are available at this URL: https://api.apify.com/v2/key-value-stores/SmuuI0oebnTWjRTUh/records/LATEST?disableRedirect=true.

You can find a dataset with unique history items here: https://api.apify.com/v2/datasets/6isaRliLnb31IoAIL/items?format=json&clean=1.

URL is being actualized every hour.
readme_summary:
# Coronavirus stats from Worldometers

Actor gets an actual number of infected, deceased and recovered people from
<https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/>.

Latest data are available at this URL: <https://api.apify.com/v2/key-value-
stores/SmuuI0oebnTWjRTUh/records/LATEST?disableRedirect=true>.

You can find a dataset with unique history items here:
[https://api.apify.com/v2/datasets/6isaRliLnb31IoAIL/items?format=json&clean=1](https://api.apify.com/v2/datasets/6isaRliLnb31IoAIL/items?format=json&clean=1).
